description: Large pads with hardened, reinforced-steel internal backbones. The extended pad and off-centre post evens out wear and extends the life.Black KS-EC2B standard compound, works in all weather conditions, but is designed for dry condition riding.Long length and off-centre postsThreaded, full-length post makes adjustments possible for all cantilever systems.Angled tip plows mud and rain off rims.Water groove pushes rain away.A set includes 1 left and 1 right pad. To replace front and rear pads requires 2 sets.
name: Kool-Stop Klaw 2 Cantilever Brake Pads (Threaded)
